Introduction

LOONA 1/3 (stylized as LOOΠΔ 1/3) is the first sub-unit of the girl group LOONA. They debuted with members HeeJin, HyunJin, HaSeul, and ViVi on March 12, 2017, on Inkigayo with their song "Love & Live". They released their first repackaged album "Love & Evil" on April 27, 2017.

LOONA 1/3’s music revolves around love, capturing the excitement of first crushes in their first album, “Love & Live,” and the heartbreak in their second album, “Love & Evil.” The group’s members represent different locations. In the LOONAVERSE, HeeJin encounters HyunJin, who attends the same school and shares the same grade. HaSeul plays the role of a nurturing friend, akin to a mother figure for YeoJin. Meanwhile, ViVi, an android with limited Korean language skills, crosses paths with JinSoul in Hong Kong.
